snippet: Senator Lindsey Graham, running for president on the Republican side, tried to explain the differences between his supporters and those who favor Donald J. Trump, using President Obama as a foil.
abstract: Senator Lindsey Graham, running for president on the Republican side, tried to explain the differences between his supporters and those who favor Donald J. Trump, using President Obama as a foil.

headline.main: Verbatim: Lindsey Graham Assesses Donald Trump’s Base of Support
